projects.bloomShare.title: BloomShare
projects.bloomShare.description: A flower website that allows users to create virtual bouquets.
projects.warehouse.title: Amazon WareHouseDeals Italia
projects.warehouse.description: A scraper for monitoring Amazon WareHouse IT discounts and price errors, enabling Telegram channel users to quickly access posted deals.
projects.captcha.title: Captcha Solver
projects.captcha.description: Deep learning image classification tool trained on 5K+ images using TensorFlow 2, achieving 95%+ accuracy in captcha solving.
projects.anticheat.title: Client AntiCheat
projects.anticheat.description: FiveM Anticheat client featuring registry scanning, memory analysis, and system monitoring capabilities.
